en.name: Day One of My New Life
en.description: Increases the wearer's DEF by {{16//18//20//22//24%}}. After entering battle, increases All-Type RES of all allies by {{8//9//10//11//12%}}. Effects of the same type cannot stack.

zh.name: 余生的第一天
zh.description: 使装备者的防御力提高{{16//18//20//22//24%}}。进入战斗后，使我方全体的全属性抗性提高{{8//9//10//11//12%}}。同类技能无法重复生效。
